sentences.english: An attacker could generate a forged signature on the assumption when the factorization problem is solved.
sentences.chinese: 一旦因子分解问题可解，攻击者就可以伪造签名。

sentences.english: The eternal mystery of the world is its comprehensibility.
sentences.chinese: 这世界永恒的谜题，是它的可解。
